nodes.text: A Pleader was a legal advocate on the planet Concord Dawn assigned to represent criminals.

During the early years of the Galactic Empire, Iving Creel was a famous Pleader on the planet Concord Dawn. He defended in a trial court an unrepentant Journeyman Protector, Boba Fett, going by the name Jaster Mereel, who had murdered a fellow Protector.
